body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       There is no fee to enter Yucca House National Monument. If you plan to visit other parks with an entrance fee, learn more about the America the Beautiful - The National Park and Federal Recreational Lands Pass series at www.nps.gov/findapark/passes.htm.
title: Yucca House National Monument: Fees & Passes
